description: Name Drop will help you grow organically by name dropping your product or service in the right places.
title: Name Drop AI
introduction: Name Drop is a social media monitoring tool that helps businesses track conversations about their products or services across various social media platforms.
features: Conversations from Reddit, Twitter, YouTube, and Facebook (Starter Plan)
As many Projects as you need (Custom Plan)
Conversations from all social media platforms (Custom Plan)
targetPeople: Businesses of all sizes looking to monitor social media conversations about their products or services.

faqs.question: How long does it take to get results?
faqs.answer: It usually takes a few minutes to start seeing results. However, it depends on the volume of conversations and the relevance of the conversations to your product.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can start for free with our free plan. More on our pricing page.

faqs.question: Will it work for my business?
faqs.answer: Name Drop works for any business that has a product or service that is being talked about on social media.

faqs.question: Does it work for small businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, Name Drop works for small businesses as well as large enterprises and our pricing is designed to be affordable for companies of all sizes.

faqs.question: What languages does Name Drop support?
faqs.answer: Name Drop supports English, but you can use the free plan to assess other languages (since other languages are in beta).
